title: SDE Intern (Frontend)
details: Developed the frontend for a fully responsive web application using HTML, Bootstrap 5 and JavaScript. Day-to-day tasks includes converting Figma designs into UI components, participating in daily sync-up meets

title: Mentor
details: Selected as a mentor for GSSoC'24, providing guidance and support to participants throughout the program. Actively engaged in fostering a collaborative and enriching learning environment.

title: Project Admin
details: Helped folks to begin with Open-source. Created an environment of working in a team among the young hustlers. Successfully merged 80+ PRs after providing proper guidance to the Open Source Enthusiast.
